weka.knowledgeflow

Interface FlowLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JSONFlowLoader, LegacyFlowLoader

    public interface FlowLoader
    Interface to something that can load a Knowledge Flow
    Version:
    $Revision: $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
